title: Athletism — Tennis (Elite) — Phase 4: Max Strength — Upper/Shoulder Integrity
equipment: Gym: rack, barbells, dumbbells, cables, landmine
goal: Strengthen pressing/pulling with scapular rhythm; decel capacity for serves/forehands.

warmup: Mobility 8–10' (ankle DF, hips, T‑spine, shoulder IR/ER)
Activation 6–8' (glute med, deep core, scapular control)
Footwork prep: pogos, carioca, lateral skips, crossover steps
main: Seated Row 4x6 (2s pause retracted), Face Pull 3x12

notes: Week 1: 4x4 heavy; Week 2: 5x3. Keep two technical tennis sessions easy.
